//used in fragment home STEPS COUNT steps Resting Avg. resting MAX HEART RATE RECENT ACTIVITY Being able to see an increase in breathing and heart rate.” “As a general rule of thumb, you should be able to talk but not sing.” \n\n Intensity refers to the rate at which the activity is being performed or the magnitude of the effort required to perform an activity or exercise.\n\n The intensity of different forms of physical activity varies between people. The intensity of physical activity depends on an individuals previous exercise experience and their relative level of fitness. Consequently, the examples given below are provided as a guide only and will vary between individuals.
